pasuwa kumarawaru upali nam ema karanawamiya samaga budun wahanse wetha elambaa, “swamini!
me wana witath adala sakakaruwan hathara dena handuna ganimata haki wi athi namuth owun ratin pitawa gos athi bawata polisiya saka karayi.
ese ma me thirana ho ekangatha pilibandawa warshaya awasanaye di dohahi di pawathwena deshaguna samuluwe di sammuthiyakata paminiyawiya yuthu ya.
dan ithin henagamata yanna puluwan” yayi kiwaya.ee gana harihati therumak apa katawath nothibunada, amma eyin apamana sathutakata path wuwaya.

wadiya katha karanna oone na,oyalama thiranaya karanna hondada,narakada kiyala.yanagaman “kamentuwakuth” dila yanna puluwannam sthuthiyi .kohoma wunath mekath kiyanna oone kiyala hithuna.mama dakapu widihata meke kament ekak denawanam denna inneth hamadama dakina huru purudu sahodara pirisak witharayi.ee aya kawuda kiyala eyala hondatama dannawa.ee nisa nam kiyanna awashya na.sthuthiyi,sahola, ee dena sahayogayata.eeka,upasirasiyak hadanna wena mahansiyata dena watina agaya kirimak.anith ayatath kiyanna thiyenne puluwannam sab karana anith ayatath podi diriganwimak karanna kament naththan wot ekakin hari udawwak denna balanna kiyalayi.eeka kament balen illimak kiyala hithanna epa.namuth eeka,meke sab karana sahodara pirisata podi rukulak weyi thawa idiriyata yanna.
api kawuruth marena minissu wechchi aaye mokatada me bheda bhinna.

ohu/aaya kiyala dewi, obe mudal walin uparima labhayak ganna widihata aayojanaya karana hati.kotas welandapala thathwayata mulikawa balapana pradhana sadhaka kihipayak thibenawa.poli anupathika wala wenas wimrate aarthika thathwayarate deshapalanika sthawarathwayathawath antharjathika thathwamema sadhaka ekathu wi, kotas welandapala thathwayata balapam aathi karanawa.uda: rate poli anupathika pahala yana wita aayojakayin kotas welandapala aayojanaya desata harenna ida thiyenawa, emagin kotas mila ihala yamak wenna puluwan.rata thula chandayak/deshapalanika asthawarathwayak godanagenawanam kotas mila pahala yanawa.ema nisa, kotas welandapala sambandhawa ha rate aarthika thathwaya sambandhawa loku danumak nomathi kenekta, kotas welandapala aayojanaya thulin labha laba ganna nam, ee sambandhayen honda danumak aathi tharawkara aayathanayen obata laba dena aayojana upadeshakage upades laba ganima itha wadagath wenawa.thawa prashna walata uththara idiriyata.kotas welandapala sambandha mul lipi kiyawanna.
pasipandu sammelanaya krida amathyanshaya me kisi thanakin mata agayimak labune naha.
thawa tika welawak yaddi bada athule karakichcha yaguliya maha wasikili barak una.
pahadima ariyakantha shilaya athi karaganima ee sathara sothapaththiyayi.

eyin samata haniwima walakwa gatha haka.
gal guhawa idiripasa muhunathe tharamak usin kataram kota jala kanduwata oroththudena aakarayen widhimathwa karawa gal guha gallen bawata pathwanne sanga sathu karawimeni.

pada geththama madhawa waidyarathna paya 21:35 0 sahruda rasa winisa oba nihanda nam | ekun wisi wana giya oba nihanda nam mama hindinnam ee nihanda nisala bawa daragena hada thula randennam nisalawa rathri nidi waritha tharaka mehewara se iwasumen hisa nama enu athi - saththakin pera manga, arunodaya sangawa yanu athi, anduru thimiraya.

mahawali adikariya wisin niwasa kada winasha kala nisa asaranawa maha maga lori thattuwaka jiwikawa gena giya pawulakata prasidda ranganashilpiyaku wana wishwa kodikara mahatha saha ohuge piya da beli aththa pradeshaye wyaparikayaku wana madushanka mahathada theldeniya jathika pasale widuhalpathiwarayada mema pin kamata sahabagi wi thibenawa
ada agamathiwarayage upades labila thiyenne e.ja.pa. pasupela manthriwarun haraha janadhipathiwarayata abhiyoga kirimatayi.

ara kama tikak adukarala ee wenuwata palathuru kana wade mama karala thiyenawa.
